# Pull Request Template

## Description / Описание
Please describe the changes made and the reason for them.

---

## Type of Change / Тип изменений
- [ ] Feature / Новая функциональность
- [ ] Bugfix / Исправление бага
- [ ] Documentation / Документация
- [ ] Refactor / Рефакторинг
- [ ] Other / Другое

---

## Checklist / Чек-лист
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have added tests where applicable
- [ ] PR is assigned to Team Lead (Илья Злотников)
- [ ] CI checks pass (if configured)
- [ ] Linked any related issue

---

## Related Issue / Связанные задачи
(If applicable, link the issue)
